00015 **   Specification for the CFS Stored Command (SC) command and telemetry 
00016 **   message data types.
00017 **
00018 ** Notes:
00019 **   Constants and enumerated types related to these message structures
00020 **   are defined in sc_msgdefs.h. They are kept separate to allow easy 
00021 **   integration with ASIST RDL files which can't handle typedef
00022 **   declarations (see the main comment block in sc_msgdefs.h for more 
00023 **   info).
